titles.title: Stolen Gun Penalty Enhancement Act of 2003
A bill to amend section 924 of title 18, United States Code, to increase the maximum term of imprisonment for offenses involving stolen firearms.
Stolen Gun Penalty Enhancement Act of 2003

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on the Judiciary.

bill.summary: Stolen Gun Penalty Enhancement Act of 2003 - Amends the Brady Handgun Violence Prevention Act to increase the maximum penalties for knowingly transporting or shipping in interstate or foreign commerce, receiving, possessing, concealing, storing, bartering, selling, or disposing of stolen firearms or ammunition.Directs the United States Sentencing Commission to amend the Federal sentencing guidelines to reflect the amendments made by this Act.
